product_name: Canari Tri Shorts - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: Achieve performance at new levels with the help of these supportive Tri Pro shorts from Canari! Supple nylon/Lycra(R) spandex blend wicks moisture away from your skin, keeping you cool when you're at a scorching pace. Lightweight, minimal-bulk microfleece chamois offers padding and wicking comfort. Elastic grippers at cuffs keep shorts from shifting up. Elastic waistband and drawcord let you customize the fit. Chafe-free flatlock seams throughout. Special buy.
short_description: Achieve performance at new levels with the help of these supportive Tri Pro shorts from Canari!
